= Uniprot DAS  =

http://www.ebi.ac.uk/uniprot-das/

= How to use Uniprot DAS through the Biological Web Services Proxy =

To use Uniprot DAS through the proxy the following parameters should be added to the proxy URL:

*bwsp_service* = Uniprot_DAS

Name of the service

*bwsp_response_format* = row | json

Response format, could be the row xml format provided by the iHOP web service or JSON. 

*bwsp_callback* = callback name

If provided the response of the server is a JSONP function 

*bwsp_url* = Uniprot DAS url

Uniprot DAS url. See the following examples

= Examples =

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=uniprot_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_url=http://www.ebi.ac.uk/das-srv/uniprot/das/uniprot/types

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=uniprot_das&bwsp_response_format=json&&bwsp_url=http://www.ebi.ac.uk/das-srv/uniprot/das/uniprot/features?segment=P04637

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=uniprot_das&bwsp_response_format=json&&bwsp_url=http://www.ebi.ac.uk/das-srv/uniprot/das/uniprot/sequence?segment=P04637
